-1.title: OVA 3

episode of.title: Yuuna and the Haunted Hot Springs (TV Series 2018– )

-1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: The Yuragi Inn's Yuuna

episode of.title: Yuuna and the Haunted Hot Springs (TV Series 2018– )

1.plot: Kogarashi Fuyuzora is a hands-on psychic, who has finally found a decent place to live and work. Being a psychic, he was supposed to easily exorcise whatever ghost was haunting his new home, but he runs into a minor problem.

2.title: Yuuna and the Hot Spring Ping Pong

episode of.title: Yuuna and the Haunted Hot Springs (TV Series 2018– )

2.plot: In accordance with the Yuragi Inn boarding house rules, Kogarashi finds himself playing a one-game match of ping pong with a certain team?

3.title: Yuuna Goes to School

episode of.title: Yuuna and the Haunted Hot Springs (TV Series 2018– )

3.plot: It's Kogarashi's first day of school and of course, Yuuna decides to tag along, and gets Kogarashi into all sorts of trouble.

4.title: Watching Youkai! Sagiri and Yaya are Cautious.

episode of.title: Yuuna and the Haunted Hot Springs (TV Series 2018– )

4.plot: Kogarashi learns more about Sagiri, and she evens hires him for a job. Wait, is this a date? Yaya also starts following Kogarashi around for some reason.

5.title: Yuuna's Body Measurements/Nonko's Crunch Time

episode of.title: Yuuna and the Haunted Hot Springs (TV Series 2018– )

5.plot: Yuuna might have found a new friend. Meanwhile, Nonko needs a lot of help from Kogarashi.

6.title: Ms. Nakai's Secret Adventure/A Sweet Day Off with Yuuna

episode of.title: Yuuna and the Haunted Hot Springs (TV Series 2018– )

6.plot: There's a certain secret that Ms. Nakai can't tell the tenants at Yuragi Inn, but she still goes on her adventure. Meanwhile, Kogarashi tries to figure out what Yuuna's lingering regrets could be.

7.title: Yuuna's Mysterious Disapppearance

episode of.title: Yuuna and the Haunted Hot Springs (TV Series 2018– )

7.plot: Yuuna and Koyuzu are running an errand when a young man they've never seen before suddenly calls out. His name is Genshiro Ryuuga, though he's called the Black Dragon God, and he's come to Yukemuri Town to find a bride.

8.title: Oboro Stops at Nothing

episode of.title: Yuuna and the Haunted Hot Springs (TV Series 2018– )

8.plot: Kogarashi, Sagiri, and Koyuzu carry out their mission to try and rescue Yuuna. However, Oboro, the Black Dragon God's attendant is a formidable enemy.

9.title: Chisaki of the Yuragi Inn

episode of.title: Yuuna and the Haunted Hot Springs (TV Series 2018– )

9.plot: Chisaki comes to visit the Yuragi Inn on the weekend. She decides to spend the night and have a sleepover, much to Yuuna and Chisaki's delight.

10.title: The Overly Aggressive Sagiri/The Seaside School and Kogarashi

episode of.title: Yuuna and the Haunted Hot Springs (TV Series 2018– )

10.plot: Yuuna tags along to Kogarashi, Sagiri, and Chisaki's seaside school trip. However, through the suggestion of another Chuuma ninja member, Urara, Sagiri needs to buy a new swimsuit.

11.title: Dancing Cheek to Cheek with Yuuna/Sagiri and the Final Exam

episode of.title: Yuuna and the Haunted Hot Springs (TV Series 2018– )

11.plot: The sea side school trip continues as Kogarashi faces a monster that was accidentally summoned.

12.title: Yuuna and the Haunted Hot Springs And...

episode of.title: Yuuna and the Haunted Hot Springs (TV Series 2018– )

12.plot: Everyone is enjoying their last few days of summer vacation. Kogarashi and Yuuna find themselves in Okinawa, and encounter another bound ghost.

imdb.plot outline: Kogarashi Fuyuzora has the ability to see supernatural, and has been possessed by ghosts since he was a kid. This has caused a lot of trouble in his life, but now he has learned to fight back against the evil spirits. Unfortunately, he's now also very poor, homeless, and hoping for a happier, more normal, high school life. In his search for housing, he's introduced to a very cheap boarding house called Yuragi Manor, which was formerly a popular hot springs inn. It's so cheap because the house is haunted by the spirit of a high school student whose corpse was found there. Kogarashi doesn't think this is going to be a problem for him, and the rest of the house's tenants appear to be sexy women. While relaxing in the hot springs, though, he finds there is an issue with his ghost-banishing plan; Yuragi Manor's ghost is a 16-year-old girl named Yuuna, who lives in his room. Kogarashi has no desire to hurt a ghost girl, and instead he ends up agreeing to help her to figure out her unfinished business. That way, she can move onto the afterlife before turning evil and falling into hell. Once it is clear that he is fine with Yuuna, the other tenants reveal their own supernatural secrets-his life in Yuragi Manor is going to be far from ordinary.

This has caused a lot of trouble in his life, but now he has learned to fight back against the evil spirits. Unfortunately, he's now also very poor, homeless, and hoping for a happier, more normal, high school life. In his search for housing, he's introduced to a very cheap boarding house called Yuragi Manor, which was formerly a popular hot springs inn. It's so cheap because the house is haunted by the spirit of a high school student whose corpse was found there. Kogarashi doesn't think this is going to be a problem for him, and the rest of the house's tenants appear to be sexy women. While relaxing in the hot springs, though, he finds there is an issue with his ghost-banishing plan; Yuragi Manor's ghost is a 16-year-old girl named Yuuna, who lives in his room. Kogarashi has no desire to hurt a ghost girl, and instead he ends up agreeing to help her to figure out her unfinished business.
